revision.comment: Reverted 1 edit by [[Special:Contributions/206.209.103.67|206.209.103.67]] identified as [[WP:VAND|vandalism]] to last revision by [[User:Gesslein|Gesslein]]. ([[WP:TW|TW]])
revision.text: <ref>{{cite encyclopedia |last=Krapp |first=Philip |coauthors=Balou, Patricia K. |year=1992 |title=Collier's Encyclopedia |volume=9 |pages=p. 135 |publisher=Macmillan Educational Company |location=[[New York City|New York]] |id= {{LCCN|91|0|61165}}}} Many people said that the first edition of the encyclopedia was very inaccurate, and had many problems in it.</ref>
